description: Unit test file for JWT validation in a FastAPI application, testing authentication modes and token verification.

methods.name: test_real_auth_mode_requires_bearer
methods.description: Tests that an unauthenticated request to /auth/debug returns 401 Unauthorized when no Bearer token is provided.

methods.name: test_real_auth_mode_uses_verifier
methods.description: Tests that providing a Bearer token results in correctly verified user info in the response.
